about_the_game:
Description: This set includes everything necessary to create an international airport.

It features an entrance hall, luggage drop-off, security check, waiting area, information desks, gates, shops, toilets, planes, and luggage collection for arrivals.

Contents

—---------------------

Animations:

● 14 animations, including bags, security bags, and runway lights

Parallaxes:

● 5 Runway parallaxes

Tilesets:

● 9 tilesets:

○ A2 - Grounds

○ A4 - Internal walls

○ B - Props, shops, gates, security check, WC, luggage drop

○ C, C2, C3 - Aircrafts and props, color variations

○ D, D2, D3 - Crashed aircraft and airport props, color variations

—---------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

Description: This set includes everything necessary to create an international airport.

It features an entrance hall, luggage drop-off, security check, waiting area, information desks, gates, shops, toilets, planes, and luggage collection for arrivals.

Contents

—---------------------

Animations:

● 14 animations, including bags, security bags, and runway lights

Parallaxes:

Tilesets:

● 9 tilesets:

○ A2 - Grounds

○ A4 - Internal walls

○ B - Props, shops, gates, security check, WC, luggage drop

○ C, C2, C3 - Aircrafts and props, color variations

○ D, D2, D3 - Crashed aircraft and airport props, color variations

—---------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
